# Spotify is a downloadable music streaming service

---

![height:500 width:1100](https://storage.googleapis.com/pr-newsroom-wp/1/2023/03/New-Home-Feed_FTR-Header-1440x733.png)

I have a liking for spotify due to its sleek, and easy to use platform with the addition of unimaginable amounts of music from popular to underground.

---


![height:700 width:1200](https://routenote.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Screenshot-2023-07-24-at-10.52.56.png)

---

![](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31qRppj8gaL.jpg)

### There's many different subscription plans to choose from, all in the $10 region.

---

![app](https://www.apple.com/v/app-store/b/images/overview/icon_appstore__ev0z770zyxoy_large_2x.png)

### Spotify is avalible on all platforms and can be purchased for free but preimum is not free

---

The headquarters are located in Stockholm, Sweeden

![bg left](https://storage.googleapis.com/pr-newsroom-wp/1/2018/11/DSC_0470-1920x733.jpg)

---

![bg](https://storage.googleapis.com/pr-newsroom-wp/1/2018/11/DSC_0482-1-1100x734.jpg)

![bg](https://storage.googleapis.com/pr-newsroom-wp/1/2018/11/20180814-DSC_9802-1100x734.jpg)

## 3 Awesome Facts/Features


---
![height:300](https://resize.indiatvnews.com/en/centered/newbucket/1200_675/2023/11/spotify-wrapped-2023-1701329035.jpg)

## With wrapped, its possible to see an abundance of facts about the previous years listening, like your most listened to artist

---


![bg](https://api.time.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/spotify-wrapped-2023-top-artists.jpg)

---

Discover weekly allows us to find new songs every week, of course adjusted to our liking

![width:600 height:500](https://thumb.spokesman.com/GsJALbsxruDIAgPJdGdubb-x00I=/2500x0/media.spokesman.com/photos/2020/07/15/5f0dee5554d81.hires.jpg)

---

Collaborative Playlist

Have 2 or more friends to collaborate and create a masterpiece of a playlist

![width:700](https://betanews.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/spotify-collaborative-playlists-1-600x399.jpg)
